summary:
**Time Magazine Summary**

Time is an American news magazine started in New York City on March 3, 1923. It was published weekly for almost 100 years but changed to every other week in 2020. Henry Luce, one of its founders, ran the magazine for many years.

Time has different editions for Europe, Asia, and the South Pacific. It covers news from these regions, including the Middle East, Africa, and Latin America. In 2018, Salesforce founder Marc Benioff bought Time and now publishes it through Time USA, LLC.
title: Time (magazine)
